thread.title: William McConnell
thread.title_full: American Apartment Owners Association reviewed by William McConnell

author: William McConnell
title: William McConnell
text: I am a first time landlord, and this company makes the process of background checks simple, easy, and fast. It is a great relief to be able to just get the job done and have it all ready to go within 24 hours.
